definition: willingness/would rather (agree to X than Y)
delighted to (do sth, idiom)/perfectly happy to do/most willing to do
both sides are willing/by mutual consent
both sides are willing/by mutual consent

sentences.english: But others seem content to rely on automatic stabilisers.
sentences.chinese: 而其余国家则情愿依赖自动稳定器的作用。

sentences.english: Gatsby and I in turn leaned down and took the small reluctant hand.
sentences.chinese: 盖茨比和我先后弯下腰来，握一握不情愿的小手。

sentences.english: Love is a sweet tyranny, because the lover endures his torment willingly.
sentences.chinese: 爱情是甜蜜的虐政，情人心甘情愿地受它的折磨。

sentences.english: All offered up sacrifices to the minion of fortune.
sentences.chinese: 所有的人都情愿为这个命运的宠儿作出牺牲。

sentences.english: Such reluctance stems in part from their limited experience of global capital markets.
sentences.chinese: 这样的不情愿部分源于他们在全球资本市场经验有限。

sentences.english: In fact, it is full of the mood to do, just fall.
sentences.chinese: 其实，这是满心情愿的事情，只是心有余而力不足。

sentences.english: I'd rather keep a constant surplus in terms of money.
sentences.chinese: 在钱的方面，我情愿经常保持有赢余。

sentences.english: And Samson said, Let me die with the Philistines.
sentences.chinese: 说，我情愿与非利士人同死。

sentences.english: As a consequence, people willingly and wholeheartedly give themselves to what she asks of them.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人们心甘情愿地全心全意地听从她的请求。

sentences.english: It can be that I am destined to struggle endlessly in the sea of art.
sentences.chinese: 为艺术，我将情愿不停地在艺海中奔波。

sentences.english: If money is also a kind of wrong, I will repeat one's mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 如果有钱也是一种错，那我情愿一错再错。

sentences.english: I know that you still do not love me, but my wishful too much.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你始终不爱我，只是我一相情愿的太多。

sentences.english: Would you like to come to supper? ( JB II, L21 )
Why is knowing that fate has done, but also willing to love you?
sentences.chinese: 为何明知缘分已尽，还心甘情愿的爱着你？

sentences.english: And we willingly take it in hour after hour, day of day, like some kind of self-hating masochists.
sentences.chinese: 而我们情愿地像受虐狂一样不断地每天订阅它。

sentences.english: I would rather sleep than watch thellos movie.
sentences.chinese: 我情愿困觉也不看这部电影。

definition: to be willing to/to resign oneself to
to be willing to do sth/to be ready to do sth/to be happy to do sth/content/satisfied
would rather.../it would be better.../would prefer
to agree/to consent/to be ready (to do sth)/willing
delighted to (do sth, idiom)/perfectly happy to do/most willing to do
preferably/one would prefer to...(or not to...)/would rather/(would) be better to/(to pick) the lesser of two evils
to feel grateful to sb/to appreciate the kindness
to tackle a difficult job (idiom)/to do sth reluctantly
